dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Unfired pressing; Green compaction; Green forming; Dry pressing; Ceramic forming
Unfired pressing; Green compaction; Green forming; Dry pressing; Ceramic forming
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Green-pressing refers to a production process that shapes a material into a desired form while it is in an unfired, unsintered, or 'green' state. This process is typically used in the ceramics and metallurgy industries. It involves compacting powdered materials into a shape, which is then usually followed by firing to create a solid product. The description of green-pressing covers the type of pressing equipment used, process parameters, the material quality, standard compliance, pressing technique, efficiency details, potential use, information about the binder (if applicable), and the production stage at which the pressing occurs. Availability of the pressed product may be indicated as 'to consumer' if it is ready for distribution or 'at plant' if it is an intermediate product requiring further processing.

绿色压制是指在材料处于未烧结或'绿色'状态时，将其成形为所需形状的生产流程。这个过程通常用于陶瓷和冶金工业。它涉及将粉末材料压缩成形，然后通常通过烧结成固体产品。绿色压制的描述涵盖了所使用的压制设备类型，工艺参数，材料质量，标准合规性，压制技术，效率详情，可能的使用，关于粘合剂的信息（如果适用），以及压制发生的生产阶段。如果压制产品已准备好分发，则其可得性可能被标记为'对消费者'，或者如果它需要进一步处理的中间产品，则表示为'在工厂'。
